item.description:
We'll meet at 7:15-7:30 for drinks/food (everyone pays for their own food/drinks). Trivia starts at 8pm. Must get there early to get a table and get on a team- the place fills up very fast! Stump trivia is tons of fun, so please join us!

NOTE: Location Change!
Tin Alley won't be hosting trivia this week, so we will be playing at Joe Sent Me in Waltham instead!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). Trivia is held in the bar area- we should be in the section on the right when you come in. I'll have a a red jacket and red pocketbook!
item.why: Have fun, relax, share your previously useless knowledge and learn lots of random info! Joint event with the New England 25+ Social Fun Meet Up Group!
item.name: Location Change! Stump Team Trivia at Joe Sent Me in Waltham This Wednesday
